description: A humorous take on bees and music.
title: Buzzing Melody
n_1: In a colorful garden, Buzzy the bee was humming.
c1_1: Why do you hum all the time?
n_2: Melody the butterfly fluttered by and asked.
c1_2: Don't you know the words to the song?
n_3: Buzzy looked puzzled and buzzed louder.
c1_3: I just hum because I don't know the words.
n_4: They both laughed and continued their day.
